intro: Jussiaea diffusa subsp. albiflora, commonly known as the white-flowered jussiaea, is a flowering plant native to parts of South America. Jussiaea diffusa subsp. albiflora is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological role in supporting local wildlife.
